description: This stylish and elegant set of memo pad and multiple chequebook holder from COI, which is perfect for your desk organizers and makes it must for your office use The size of this Chequebook Holder when closed is ( L X B X H cm) 27 X 14 X 2. Card Slot - 1 , Document Pocket Holder Slot -2 , Pocket Slot - 1. This is Quirky And Useful Gift Perfect for Office/ Home Which Makes It a Must have. It is a Diary Style Desk Organizer,Memo Note Pad With A Closed Size Of ( L X B X H cm) 19.5 X 10 X 1.5. It Has 3 Sizes Of Sticky Note Pad & 1 Pas Of Loose Sheets With Clip Holder And A Pen. No. Of Sheets In Sticky Note Pad Of Yellow (Approx Size 10 X 7.5 Cms.) Pink (Approx Size 7.5 X 5 Cms.) Are 35 Approx . No. Of Small Strips / Flags (Approx Size 4.5 X 1 Cms.) Are 20 Approx. Each Colour And No Of Loose S It’s Perfect for travel and make personal notes etc. Fits well in handbags. Value for money , Smart and useful utility product OCCASIONS:- Gorgeous detailing makes it great for gifting for Anniversary, Birthday, festive and Executive & Corporate Gift
